soulWeapon.advancement0: Summons the Soul of Lea's Messenger, Cocytus, dealing xxx M.DMG to frontral enemies in a straight line, knocking them back far away for 3 sec, and inflicting 'Raven Catastrophe' for 10 sec. Targets inflicted with 'Raven Catastrophe' have their ATK reduced by 40%.
soulWeapon.advancement1: Reduces Heal Rate of the target inflicted with Raven Catastrophe by 50%.
soulWeapon.advancement2: Reduces Skill Activation Requirements to 3 times.
soulWeapon.activation: Charges up upon using Skills 4 times.

dark: Upon a Crit Hit, target's CC resistance is reduced by 250 for 10 sec, and all Skill Cooldown, excluding the skill in use, is reduced by 2% each.

background.story: Although she was a Holy Maiden of Lua in the past, she eventually fell into corruption. Now, this cynical, crow-commanding witch curses her former Goddess from the darkness. There was a time when she was a friend of Kyle and a heroine of the people. However, when Kyle disappeared, she hid herself from the world as well. She eventually came back as a fallen witch, threatening mankind as the spearhead of the Demon Army. These days, however, she appears to be plotting some scheme, not as a Demon commander, but completely on her own.

itemIntroductions.weapon: A mysterious raven that can travel across dimensions. Its intelligence and shrewdness are certainly not those of a mere bird. In truth, it is a monster filled with dark energy, much like Demons. Indeed, it is said that this beast is as powerful as a high-ranking Demon. Some claim that it occasionally flies over fields of battle, speaking in human languages. Much of this creature's identity is still shrouded in mystery.
treasures: A magic mirror that summons Tempest Elemental Aerial. This magical mirror is made with an obsidian stone from Pandemonium, and Tempest Elemental Aerial sleeps inside it. Whenever Raven Storm is used, Aerial awakes and amplifies its effect with its violent dance.

A claw armor that Maria gifted to Lea's messenger. The claw armor that is made with fancy gold contains a binding curse that never lets go of any enemy that it grabs. Enemies bound by the messenger's Sabaton will become defenseless against magic attacks and will receive great damage.

Ashes of a grey messenger that announces the end. These are the ashes of the raven that flew into the Church of Lua right before the Republic of Gray collapsed a hundred years ago. Everyone ignored the ominous messenger, and only Priestess Maria cared for it until its last day. Even after its death, it has helped Maria expand her area of darkness by pouring its dark energy on her.
A letter of notice issued from Lea's Messenger. This letter created by the Essence of Darkness contains a warning and the terms of the contract that Maria made with the darkness.
